Achei o jogo muito interessante e divertido de jogar dês da primeira vez em que abri o jogo. A mecânica dos personagens e de como temos que fazer para escapar deixam o jogo mais intrigante, só realmente acho que devem ser feitos ajustes em algumas coisas, como habilidades de alguns sobreviventes e também balancear os poderes dos assassinos.

Oyun çok başarılı ve çok eğlenceli hele bir arakadaş ortamınız varsa çok daha zevkli oluyor oyunun tek sıkıntısı oynmayı bilmeyen sizi campleyen ve size takıntılı olan katiller sizi kovalarken takım arkadaşlarınız jenaratörleri yapıp kaçıyorlar fakat öldüğünüz için pek zevk alamıyorsunuz ve ikinci bir sıkıntısı ise oyun içi ve lobisinde çok fazla bug var sürekli sizi guruptan atıyor ve bir süre sonra gerçekten can sıkıcı olabiliyor oyun içinde de bazı buglar mevcut çok da fazla olamsa da ama lobideki buglar daha fazla ve acilen düzeltilmesi lazım !!!!!
oyun genel anlamda güzel alabilirsiniz
ee oyun güzel fakat hatalara bazen can sıkıcı olabiliyor lütfen gereksiz hatları ve bugları ve arada sırada olan dropları düzeltin arkadaşla oynamanız daha iyi olur katilde maçı biraz yavas buluyo

If you hate yourself then this game won't help. The devs actively ignore balance and updating useless perks, or adding new game modes and modifiers to it's only game mode it has (technically 2 modes but not really). There have been countless nights where I have been brought to my breaking point and either deleted it or quit for 6 months as of my last break before coming back. Would I recommend it? No...no I wouldn't. Will you become addicted to it? Yes, most definitely. Goodluck

Ok, I love playing DbD, and I love watching other ppl play DbD. That being said, I'm going to get straight to the point of this review; This game and it's community are not perfect by any means. There are issues, as with most multiplayer games, and if you can get past them, I think you'll likely like the game. They've recently changed the match making system, which in truth has always been a mess and IMO still is. Used to be more or less based on time played for the month so if you stayed in the mid/green ranks you typically didn't have to deal with too many toxic players. But the new system is based on wins/losses and supposed to create "fairer, more balanced" match making, but in my experience it has actually made the game more toxic and less fun to play. Mabey it's the region I'm playing in, mabey it's my "skill" lvl, I don't know.

Замечательная игра
Зашел в игру, и всё прям как в реальности
Тут бабушкин домик,поля с кукурузкой, толчок деревнский
Прям атмосферно

Везде стоят какие то электро штуки, зачем они сделаны в деревне,где интернет почти не работает.Не понимаю
Ходят какие то ублюдки по ночам и зачем то реставрируют эти электро жужащие бурчащие штуки и над ними появляется свет
Какие то маги прям
Иногда посреди ночи можно услышать РУССКУЮ ПЕСЕНКУ а потом очень громкие крики какой то девушки, будто ее вешают на кол :D
Единственный минус поезда в деревню, она находится рядом с кладбищем, и вороны постоянно атакуют наши поля с кукурузой 
И почему то по всему огороду у бабушки, расставлены крюки но на них нет пугала 
Потому что она сама как пугало, и мне иногда даже страшно спать с ней в одном доме

It's amazing how a game with so much potential still fails.
This game has been out since 2016 and still has core issues that just won't get fixed. This company continues to add cosmetics and new killers and survivors instead of dealing with the real issues of the game first. Despite all the "new addons" you're stuck with the same crappy game.
The idea for this game is great, the mechanics however are horrible.
Hitbox detection is or can be pathetic. Getting hit way outside range or through walls or even 2-3 steps after you've vaulted through a window. 
Then you have killers like the cannibal where all you have to do is wave your chainsaw around like an idiot and you'll hit someone because again the hitbox detection.... It's as if they made killers like him for retarted people to use or people with no thumbs.
The constant gifted bloodpoints for playing or logging on is also common. It feels like they don't want people to stop playing their game so they start handing it out like candy to keep people but after a game or two you realize you're still playing hot trash. 
Leveling up in this game is a curse. Instead of dealing with higher tiered players/killers you end up running into an onslaught of people who abuse the broken system with glitching, cheating, camping and tunneling their butts off. Ruining the game completely. Its basically better to play till you reach a high tier then stop playing for a month so your level can go down and you can go back to having somewhat fun. I think it's safe to say this game won't change. I mean it doesn't have to the simple minded continue to play it and complain so why would anyone be forced to fix any of the main issues.
Ultimately I'm uninstalling the game. It's just a waste of time.
